A **barding** is a special type of armour designed to cover the lower half of [Armataurs](/Armataur "Armataur") and [Nagas](/Naga "Naga"). It fills the feet slot in place of [boots](/Boots "Boots"), which these species cannot wear.

While they give significantly more AC than normal boots, bardings give a flat penalty of -2 [EV](/EV "EV"). This cannot be reduced by strength or Armour skill. This will not penalize spellcasting, stealth, etc.

Bardings can be maximally enchanted to +4 using [scrolls of enchant armour](/Scrolls_of_enchant_armour "Scrolls of enchant armour").

### Egos

Bardings can carry the following [egos](/Ego "Ego"):

- [Fire resistance](/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance")
- [Cold resistance](/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance")
- [Flight](/Flight_\(ego\) "Flight (ego)")
- [Stealth](/Stealth "Stealth")

[Artefact](/Artefact "Artefact") bardings can also spawn with these egos:

- [See invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible")
- [Rampaging](/Rampaging "Rampaging")

## Sources

Bardings are moderately rare items:

- The [uniques](/Unique "Unique") [Nessos](/Nessos "Nessos") and [Vashnia](/Vashnia "Vashnia") always wear bardings.
- A [scroll of acquirement](/Scroll_of_acquirement "Scroll of acquirement") is likely to give bardings if you haven't found one yet.
- [Okawaru](/Okawaru "Okawaru") gifts a choice of armour, which is very likely to have a barding available.

## History

- Prior to [0.30](/0.30 "0.30"), artefact bardings couldn't spawn with the [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible") or [rampaging](/Rampaging "Rampaging") egos.
- Prior to [0.26](/0.26 "0.26"), there were two types of barding: [centaur barding](/Centaur_barding "Centaur barding") and [naga barding](/Naga_barding "Naga barding"). Each species could only wear one of the two types.
